casebody.data:
State
v.
David Michael Reed 365A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 6, 2017 Paul E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Reed, David Michael. E. Burke Haywood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of January 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of January 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 16th day of February 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
